entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @IvankaTrump Let’s see Sunday vibes: Russia is killing our soldiers, unemployment is still at an all time high, COVID-19 is being completely ignored and raging through America, there’s still children in cages, racism is getting promoted daily by your daddy. https://t.co/7aQrk81QWB
